name: Disaster Blaster
description:
I recommend you play with a dual-stick controller, but you can play with Arrows/WASD if you must!

A game made for the Idle Thumbs "Walking in a Winter Wizard" Jam. Disaster Blaster was made in two weeks based off something Jake Rodkin said in Idle Thumbs Ep. 233

Read the dev log and learn about how the game was made over on the Idle Thumbs forums: Disaster Blaster Dev Log
